K10nagsu_pu:402: tenopasaṃkrānta upetya mama pādau śirasā vanditvā yathā svakāṃ niḥśṛtya ekānte tasthur
K10nagsu_pu:406: Mac 8.4 reads svakasva .. .. śiṃ; cf. NagSū II.12:
K10nagsu_pu:409: NagSū II.31 idaṃ vaditvā catvāro mahārājāno mama pādau śirasā vanditvā māṃ tṛḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā
K10nagsu_pu:410: tatraivāntarhitāḥ udgṛhṇata bhikṣavo nagaropamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ dhārayata grāhayata vācayata
K10nagsu_pu:411: paryavāpnuta manasikuruta tat kasmād dheto arthopasaṃhitaṃ nagaropamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ
K10nagsu_pu:414: NagSū II.32 atha ca punaḥ kulaputreṇa śraddhāpravrajitena śraddhayā agārād anagārikaṃ
K10nagsu_pu:415: pravrajitvā nagaropamaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca udgṛhṇitavyaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ
K10nagsu_pu:416: grāhayitavyaṃ vācayitavyaṃ svādhyāyitavyaṃ paryavāptavyaṃ manasīkartavyaṃ idam avocat //
